channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OR

item.title: Report X-2025010046
item.description:
Report X-2025010046

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-07T18:25:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-22
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO CALL. BROUGHT BACK MULTIPLE PACKAGES FROM A LEAKING PACKAGE. UPON INSPECTION DISCOVERED ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL HAD LEAKED FROM LOOSE CAP. NO EXTERNAL MARKINGS OR NOTATIONS ON UPS LABEL THAT THE PACAKGE CONTAINED FLAMMABLE LIQUID. SUBMITTING AS AN UNDECLARED IN ETT.

item.title: Report X-2025010012
item.description:
Report X-2025010012

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-07T18:25:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-06
  • City: EUGENE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED OPENED IN THE UNLOAD. CONTENTS FALLING OUT OF PACKAGE. CONTAINED IN A BIN. BROUGHT OVER TO DMP. THEN FOUND IT IN DMP, REALIZED THAT THE CONTENTS WERE PRESSURIZED CANISTERS. THERE WERE NO MARKINGS ON THE OUTER BAG.

item.title: Report X-2025010011
item.description:
Report X-2025010011

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-07T18:25:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-06
  • City: EUGENE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS FOUND OPENED IN THE UNLOAD/TRAILER. THE SUPERVISOR BROUGHT IT OVER TO THE DMP AREA FOR INSPECTION DUE TO MISSING CONTENTS. THEN INSPECTED IT AND SAW THAT THERE WAS AN AIR CANISTER. THE PACKAGE DIDN'T HAVE ANY OUT LABLES STATING WHAT WAS IN THE PACKAGE. REWRAP; NO LEAK
